entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon then changing to periods of rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
